text: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

translation.en: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading
translation.id: pandangan mereka tertunduk, ketika mereka keluar dari kuburan, seakan-akan mereka belalang yang beterbangan
